entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
